Spinach.description: Leafy green vegetable rich in iron and other essential nutrients. Great in salads or smoothies.

Salmon.description: Fatty fish high in omega-3s and protein. Excellent for brain and heart health.

Bananas.description: Sweet fruit that's great for energy and muscle function.

Dark Chocolate.description: Rich in magnesium and antioxidants. Choose 70% or higher cocoa content for best benefits.

Sweet Potatoes.description: Nutritious root vegetable rich in vitamins and minerals.

Almonds.description: Nutrient-dense nuts that are great for snacking and brain health.

Oranges.description: Citrus fruit packed with vitamin C and immune-boosting properties.

Lentils.description: Plant-based protein source rich in iron and fiber.

Avocados.description: Creamy fruit loaded with heart-healthy monounsaturated fats, great for skin and overall wellness.

Chia Seeds.description: Tiny seeds packed with fiber and omega-3s, excellent for digestion and heart health.

Greek Yogurt.description: Thick, creamy yogurt full of protein and probiotics to support gut health and muscle recovery.

Broccoli.description: Cruciferous vegetable rich in vitamins and fiber, beneficial for immune support and digestion.

Quinoa.description: Complete plant-based protein and high-fiber grain, ideal for vegetarians and those seeking a gluten-free alternative.

Tomatoes.description: Sweet and tangy fruit loaded with antioxidants and nutrients beneficial for skin and heart health.

Eggs.description: High-quality protein source with essential vitamins and minerals, perfect for muscle repair and immune function.

Kale.description: Dark leafy green high in vitamins and antioxidants, great for bone health and detoxifying the body.

Carrots.description: Crunchy root vegetable rich in beta-carotene, ideal for eye health and immune support.

Cucumber.description: Hydrating vegetable high in water content, perfect for refreshing snacks and skin health.

Pomegranate.description: Juicy fruit packed with antioxidants and immune-boosting properties, great for heart health.

Mango.description: Tropical fruit rich in vitamins and fiber, boosting immune function and digestive health.

Chicken Breast.description: Lean protein source that supports muscle growth, ideal for post-workout meals.

Sweet Peppers (Bell Peppers).description: Colorful and crunchy, bell peppers are high in vitamins and antioxidants, enhancing immune health.

Pumpkin Seeds.description: Nutrient-dense seeds packed with magnesium, protein, and zinc, excellent for heart health and boosting immunity.

Hummus.description: Creamy dip made from chickpeas, high in fiber and protein, great for snacks and digestion.

Apples.description: Crunchy fruit rich in fiber and vitamin C, perfect for maintaining digestive health and boosting immunity.

Coconut.description: Tropical fruit that provides healthy fats and fiber, good for skin hydration and heart health.

Tofu.description: Versatile plant-based protein made from soybeans, ideal for vegetarians and vegans looking for a protein source.

Cabbage.description: Cruciferous vegetable rich in fiber and vitamin C, supports digestion and detoxification.

Peas.description: Green legumes high in protein and fiber, promoting muscle health and digestive function.
